name: DBZ Heroes United
description:
Action Adventure DBZ! 

Key Features:

  • Free2play,
  • Daily Goals,
  • Idle Training,
  • No Level Cap,
  • Battle Royale,
  • Player Housing,
  • CCG Deck Battles,
  • Online Open World,
  • Seasonal Scoreboards,
  • 100+ Unlockable Heroes,
  • Classic 2011-Edition Server (Available on Discord),

Heroes United is a DBZ flavored MMO that's been around since the early 2000's.  The latest version features Fortnite-esq Battle Royales, a gacha-Roster with 100+ Heroes to unlock, and Daily Goals, with a streamlined UI, to easily access a variety of rewarding game modes.  

Join HU on Discord @ https://discord.gg/qzwzKPV
